tag_list: robin, dweeteng, robin-sagacious, mobile, mobile-social, mobile-gaming, robin-ng, gaming, mobile-networking
overview:
A mobile social and gaming advocate in the asia pacific region. Robin is dynamic and results-oriented business person with more than 10 years experience in the mobile sector. He has been following the social networking and gaming trend for years and is knowledgeable professional in this field in the south east asia region

Presently taking care of business development matters with mobiel operators in Mozat which is one of the leading mobile social platform provider in Asia.

On the site, Robin is the editor for sites like www.mobilenewsasia.com and www.mobilesocialhub.com which aggregates news and information from various industry sites
